item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, February 21, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:

21. 12 years of Backblaze data center storage drives, visualized (95 points | 38 comments)

24. On Running systemd-nspawn Containers (2022) (90 points | 37 comments)

26. US Judge invalidates blood glucose sensor patent, opens door for Apple Watch (371 points | 134 comments)
